James Brandon is a professional photographer based in Fort Worth, Texas and is author of several ebooks and video publications through self-publication as well as Flatbooks.com. James specializes in travel and landscape photography and also has a strong passion for teaching and photography education, hosting private and group workshops.
An in-depth course that will teach you to avoid/correct 10 of the most common mistakes photogs make with their images.
